ComicInfo.Summary:
Second Death Part Two: Out of My MindHaving finally remembered that he was tossed back through time when he accidentally destroyed the Earth in a black hole, Phil must now prevent that terrible mistake from being repeated! Unable to convince Dr. Dobson to shut down the Edgewater reactor, Phil suffers a seizure and splits into two superhuman personas. When these two clash in Antarctica, most of the ice-cap is vaporized.
Solar (first in costume - as Dr. Solar)
Alpha and Omega. Part TwoThe experimental fusion reactor at the Edgewater Fusion Energy Research Center a.k.a. "the Edge" threatened to explode, killing millions. Doctor Phillip Seleski, principal designer of the device, raced into the containment, sacrificing his own life to shut the reactor down manually. Now, moments after the event is stilled, a team of technicians enters to recover Seleski's remains.
Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-01-31 15:11:52. [Issue ID 34704]
